6.text: In outline click on class and open in hierarchy 6.

7.text: Double click view title bar to make it fill the entire desktop 7.

8.text: Click MyClass, the view shrinks back to it's original size/location.

9.text: Note: This only happens if you select the class you have added to the hierarchy view.
